description: Protect your precious iPad Mini touch screen with the Anti-Microbial Screen Protector from Infinite Products. High quality and ultra clear, the Anti-Microbial will protect your iPad Mini screen from scratches, scrapes, and the little bugs that cannot be seen. With 2 in the pack, you can share with friends, or keep some for later.
title: Infinite Products Anti-Microbial Screen Protector Film for iPad mini - 2 Pack (IP00705_F)
